title: Monster Bug Wars Series 2 1of6 Blood on the Forest Floor 720p x2
description:
Monster Bug Wars! : Series 2

Nature Documentary hosted by Henry Strozier, published by Discovery Channel in 2013 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/e/e6/Monster-Bug-Wars-Series-2-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Monster Bug Wars!: Series 2
"Monster Bug Wars" takes you ringside to witness some of nature's deadliest encounters-where losers aren't just KO'd, they're eaten alive. This is the no-holds-barred, real-life world of Spiders, Scorpions, Centipedes and Killer Ants who fight to the death. It's a six-episode bug-eat-bug gladiatorial contest where stings, spikes and deadly venom are wielded with cold-blooded precision. Filmed in super close-up high definition and illustrated with state-of-the-art CGI, Monster Bug Wars brings to life nature's ultimate fight club-five encounters per episode-with expert commentary from Cornell University's eminent entomologist, Dr Linda Rayor, and "Professor Poison", Dr Bryan Grieg Fry from The University of Queensland.


1)  Blood on the Forest Floor 
A Brazilian wandering spider tracks a hooded mantis; a land crab stumbles into a colony of army ants; a velvet worm meets a harvestman; a black jungle stalker spider encounters a black-faced katydid; a red Forest scorpion squares off against an amblypygid.

2)  Ultra Violence 
Violence erupts as a Giant Cockroach fights a Red-rump Tarantula; a Stripe-tailed Centipede targets a Vinegarroon, and an Orange Horned Katydid tackles a Banana Spider. A Golden Carpenter Ant tries to nail a Flag-tailed Assassin Bug.

3)  Mother of All Wars 
A baby black-tailed scorpion that has been shaken off its mother's back encounters a pirate spider; A rock spider battles a lichen bark mantis; A candy cane katydid and a bug-eyed katydid collide; A spitting spider first encounters a black-tailed scorpion, then later a comb-footed spider; A tiger assassin bug gets trapped in a silver-back cross spider's web.

4)  Murderous Intent 
A Leaf Cutter Ant faces a House Spider, a Costa Rican Cellar Spider fights a Geophilid Centipede, a Tiger Jumping Spider fights a Rainforest Jumping Spider, and a Katydid meets an Orange-mouth Tarantula. Then Dinosaur Ants battle a bunch of Trap Jaw Ants.

5)  Deadly Duels 
A moss antis clashes with a tiger beetle; A horned katydid attacks an owl butterfly caterpillar; An army ant soldier strays too close to an ogre-faced spider's web; A red-thighed wandering spider stalks a black-tailed scorpion; A longicorn beetle flies into the web of a flame-bellied orb weaver.

6)  Super Slayers 
A Leaf-tailed Mantis fights a Raspy Cricket and an armored Spiny Spider is ambushed by a Crab Spider. An underwater Mudeye duels with a Water Bug, then a Domino Beetle fights a Crimson-legged Assassin Bug while a Mangrove Tree Crab faces a Leopard Spider.
